Title: Vacation Hunter
Writer: Paul Hutchinson, Daz Spencer-Lovesey (story), Daz Spencer-Lovesey, Matt Wells (story)
Actors: Michelle Crane, Andy Done Johnson, Bran O'Brien, Simon Lee Phillips
Plot: The film center's around the trials and tribulations of two back-packing friends as they take a unwilling journey down the rivers and into the heart and history of the industrial revolution...
